meta.description: Alexis De Chiara's portfolio site (Front-end developer & UX/UI designer) including all diplomas, projects and ways to contact me.

skills.description: If you're here to see my skills and learn more about what I've done, you've come to the right place: I'm a front-end web developer who also likes to make UI/UX models. Very self-taught, I have always been passionate about computers and new technologies.

firstColumn.title: Front-end developer
firstColumn.subtitle: I can program a whole website, but I have a preference for the front-end

secondColumn.title: UI/UX Designer
secondColumn.subtitle: I've always liked things to be beautiful, so it's only logical that I'm also interested in UI/UX design.

career.title: My career
career.subtitle: Here are the studies I did during my school years.

2021.title: University Diploma of Technology in Computer Science
2021.description: Initial training leading to the learning of all types of existing programming languages.

2022.title: Professional license APIDAE
2022.description: Work-study course with the company Orange Business Services in order to pursue studies in computer science in the field of the web, course: Computer Project Assistant, E-business Application Development.
